p: Human embryonic kidney 293T (ATCC CRL-11268), human lung epithelial carcinoma A549 (ATCC CCL-185), and Madin-Darby canine kidney, MDCK (ATCC CCL-34) cells were grown and maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) (Mediatech, Inc.) supplemented with 5% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Atlanta Biologicals) and 1% penicillin (100 U/mL)–streptomycin (100 μg/mL)–2 mM L-glutamine, P-S-G (Mediatech, Inc.) at 37 °C in air enriched with 5% CO 2.
